item.description:
It has been over a year since we have graced this establishment with our presence. maybe they have forgotten about us.... hmmm anyway, I think it is safe to go back now.

KOXC is 89 nm and the 121 at Oxford is fine dining on the ramp. This is not your typical airport restaurant. don't miss this one. Parking is available for about four planes at the restaurant, and the FBO will shuttle the rest of us. Don't miss this one!

Check out the menu at 121 Restaurant

http://www.navmonster...

Field Elevation: 726 CTAF/Tower: 118.475 FUEL: 100LLA
Runway: 18/36 length: 5800x100
FBO KeyAir 122.95

or visit AirNav - KOXC for more airport information

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Waterbury-Oxford 121 Restaurant
